Question: On their list of the 100 Greatest Fictional Characters, Fandomania.com ranked this person at number 6.
Hints: This person brings Luke onto the second Death Star, where the Emperor tries to seduce Luke to the dark side.
In the satirical cartoon show Lil' Bush, Dick Cheney's father is portrayed as being this person.
Cheney's wife, Lynne, presented Stewart with a this person action figure on her appearance on the show on October 10, 2007.
